title: LF Diamond/Master/Chal ranked team
body: Hey guys, currently Master OCE looking for a serious ranked team to play/practise/have fun on. Add me in game, B1G Kr1T if you have a spot or are interested. Thanks.

replies.body:
im starting up a semi serious team that will be playing towards open ladder currently have one challenger and a diamond jungle add me in game or pm our Facabook page

https://www.facebook.com/pages/Synergy-Gaming/810423799051087?ref=bookmarks
